price: 10. Y, ciertamente, enviamos (otros mensajeros) antes de ti (¡oh, Muhammad!) a antiguas comunidades;
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ فِي شِيَعِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā min qablika fī shiyaʿi al-awalīna
